description.name: FraudLabs Pro
description.tagline: Fraud detection to prevent fraud and minimize chargebacks.
description.long:
FraudLabs Pro provides sophisticated fraud detection solution helping merchants to prevent payment fraud and minimize chargeback & losses.

FraudLabs Pro performs a fraud validation using data attributes including geolocation, proxy, email, credit card, transaction velocity and others to calculate a risk score and provide detailed insights to aide with manual review.
features: Automatically screen and block orders before fraudulent transactions occur
Detailed insights allow you to make informed decisions when reviewing orders manually
Support for rules allows tailoring order blocks
